name: @forensicate/app
description: AI prompt injection scanner - web application

scripts.build: npm run test && tsc -b && vite build && npm run build:standalone
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run test && tsc -b && vite build && npm run build:standalone:gh-pages
scripts.build:standalone: vite build --config vite.config.single.ts && cp dist-single/index.html dist/forensicate-standalone.html
scripts.build:standalone:gh-pages: vite build --config vite.config.single.ts && cp dist-single/index.html dist/forensicate-standalone.html
scripts.build:single: tsc -b && vite build --config vite.config.single.ts && cp dist-single/index.html public/forensicate-standalone.html
